chapter.text: 38|1|Coraada, sapata upadesapurna kora'anara
38|2|baram kaphirasakala aud'dhatya arau biraodhitata nipatita hai ache.
38|3|Ihamtara purbe ami bahuto janagosthika dhbansa karaicho, tetiya sihamte (sahaya bicarai) cinamraichila. Kintu tetiya paraitraanara kono samaya nachila.
38|4|Arau sihamte bismaya bodha karaiche ye, sihamtara ocarata sihamtara majara paraa'i ejana satarkakarai ahiche arau kaphirasakale kaya, ‘e'om ejana yadukara, michaliya’.
38|5|‘E'om sakalo ilahaka kerala ejana ilaha bana'i laiche neki? Niscaya e'ito eta atyascarya bisaya!’
38|6|Arau sihamtara netrsthaniya byaktisakale e'i katha kai amtarai yaya ye, ‘tomaloke'o guci yoraa arau nija nija upasyabilakara pujata abicala thaka. Niscaya e'i bisayato uddesyamulaka’.
38|7|Ami ana kono dharmadarsata enekuraa katha ketiya'o suna na'i, e'ito manesaja uktira bahirae ana eko nahaya.

38|8|‘Amara majara paraa kerala te'omra oparatahe yikara (kora'ana) aratirna karaa ha’la’? Prakrtate sihamte amara kora'ana samparke sandehata patita haiche. Baram sihamte etiya'o mora sasti bhoga karaa na'i.
38|9|Athaba sihamtara ocarata tomara pratipalakara bhandara ache neki? Yijana mahaparaakramasali, asima data.

38|10|Athaba akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majara sakalo bastura oparata sihamtara kono kartrtba ache neki? Yadi ache teneha’le sihamte kono upaya aralambana karai (akasalai) araohana karaa ucita
38|11|e'i bahini tata arasye paraajita ha’ba, purbararti dalasamuhara darae.
38|12|Ihamtara purbe'o asbikara karaichila nuhara sampradaye, ada arau lauha saladharai phira'a'une
38|13|arau chamuda, lagate luta sampradaya arau a'ikara adhibasibilake'o. Sihamta achila eko ekota bisala bahini.
38|14|Sihamtara pratyeke'i raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila. Phalata sihamtara oparata amara sasti sabyasta haichila.
38|15|Arau ihamta kerala apeksa karai ache eta bikata sabdara, yara pichata kono biraama nathakiba.
38|16|Arau sihamte ka’ba, ‘he amara raba! Hicapa dirasara purbe'i amara praapya amaka sighrae pradana karaa!’
38|17|Sihamte yi kaya se'i bisaye tumi dhairya dharana karaa arau smarana karaa amara saktisali banda da'udara katha, niscaya te'om achila adhika allaha abhimukhi (ta'obakarai).
38|18|Niscaya ami parbatamalaka anugata karai dichilo, yate e'iborae te'omra lagata puraa-gadhuli mora paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karae
38|19|Arau samabeta caraa'iborako (anugata karai dichilo); pratyeke'i achila adhika allaha abhimukhi.
38|20|Arau ami te'omra raajyaka sudrrha karaichilo arau te'omka pradana karaichilo hikamata arau mimansakarai bagmita.
38|21|Arau tomara ocarata bibadamana lokasakalara sambada ahi pa'ichene? Yetiya sihamte praacira baga'i ibadatara tha'ita praraesa karaichila.

38|22|Yetiya te'omloke da'udara ocarata praraesa karaile, tetiya te'om te'omlokaka dekhi bhaya khale. Te'omloke ka’le, ‘bhaya nakaraiba, ami duta bibadamana paksa. Amara ijane sijanara oparata simalanghana karaiche, eteke apuni amara majata n'yaya bicara karai diyaka, abicara nakaraiba arau amaka sathika patha pradarsana karaka.

38|23|‘Niscaya e'om mora bhatr. E'omra niraanabbai ta bheraa ache; arau mora ache kerala eta bheraa. Tathapi'o te'om kaya, ‘se'ito moka di diya’, arau tarkata te'om mora oparata praadhan'ya bistara karaiche’.

38|24|Da'ude ka’le, ‘tomara bheraatoka te'omra bheraaborara lagata yukta karaara dabi karai te'om tomara prati an'yaya karaiche. Niscaya yautha ansidarabilakara bahute'i ijane sijanara oparata simalanghana karae, kerala te'omlokara bahirae yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche, kintu te'omloka sankhyata ati takara’. Da'ude buji pale ami te'omka paraiksahe karailo. Tara pichata te'om nija pratipalakara ocarata ksama praarthana karaile arau nata hai chajadaha aranata ha’la, arau te'omra abhimukhi ha’la.
38|25|Tetiya ami te'omka ksama karai dilo. Niscaya amara ocarata te'omra babe ache naikatyara maryada arau uttama pratyarartanasthala.

38|26|‘He da'uda! Niscaya ami tomaka prthiraita pratinidhi bana'icho, eteke tumi manuhara majata subicara karaa arau prabrttira anusarana nakaraiba, kiyano ene karaile i tomaka allahara pathara paraa bicyuta karaiba’. Niscaya yisakale allahara pathara paraa bicyuta haya sihamtara babe ache kathina sasti, karana sihamte bicara dirasaka paharai gaiche.

38|27|Arau ami akasa, prthirai lagate e'i duyora majata thaka kono bastuke'i anarthaka srsti karaa na'i. E'ito dharana kerala sihamtara yisakale kupharai karaiche, eteke yisakale kupharai karaiche sihamtara babe ache agnira durbhoga.
38|28|Yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche ami te'omlokaka prthiraita biparyaya srstikaraisakalara samatulya ganya karaima neki? Ne ami muttakbisakalaka papistabilakara darae ganya karaima
38|29|ekhana barakatamaya puthi, yito ami tomara prati aratirna karaicho, yate manuhe iyara ayatasamuhata gabhirabharae cinta karae arau yate bodhasakti sampanna byaktisakale upadesa grahana karae.
38|30|Arau ami da'udaka dana karaichilo chula'imana. Kimana ye uttama banda achila te'om! Niscaya te'om achila atisaya allaha abhimukhi.
38|31|Smarana karaa, gadhuli yetiya te'omra sanmukhata drautagami utkrsta asbaraajika upasthapana karaa ha’la
38|32|tetiya te'om ka’le, ‘ma'i dekhuna mora pratipalakara smaranara paraa bimukha hai aisbarya praitita magna hai paraicho, ipine surya pardara amrata guci gaiche
38|33|‘e'iboraka mora ocaralai ghuraa'i ana’. Tara pichata te'om se'iborara bharai arau dinita aghata karai jabeha karaibalai dharaile.
38|34|Arasye ami chula'imanaka paraiksa karaichilo arau te'omra asanara oparata raakhichilo eti deha, tara pichata chula'imana amara abhimukhi ha’la.
38|35|Te'om ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Moka ksama karai diya arau moka enekuraa ekhana raajya dana karaa yito mora pichata ana karao babe prayojya naha’ba. Niscaya tumi parama data’.
38|36|Tetiya ami batahaka te'omra adhina karai dilo, yito te'omra adesata te'om ya’ta iccha karaichila se'i tha'ite mrdumandabharae prabahita haichila
38|37|arau (adhina karai dichilo) pratyeka attalika nirmanakarai arau dubarau chayatanaborako
38|38|sikalita arad'dha arau bahutake.
38|39|E'ibora amara anugraha, eteke iyara paraa tumi anako dana karaiba paraa arau nijara babe'o samci thaba paraa. Iyara kono hicaba diba nalage.
38|40|Arau niscaya te'omra babe ache amara ocarata naikatyara maryada arau uttama pratyarartanasthala.
38|41|Arau smarana karaa, amara banda a'iyyubaka, yetiya te'om nija pratipalakaka ahbana karai kaichila, ‘niscaya moka cayatane yantrana arau kastata pela'iche’
38|42|(ma'i te'omka ka’lo,) ‘tumi nijara bharairae bhumita aghata karaa, eya haiche ga dhubara babe susitala pani arau paniya’.
38|43|Arau ami te'omka dana karailo te'omra paraiyalabarga arau te'omlokara darae arau bahuto, amara phalara paraa anugrahasbaraupa arau bodhasakti sampanna lokasakalara babe upadesasbaraupa.

38|44|Arau (ami te'omka adesa karailo) ‘tumi emuthi ghamha loraa arau se'itorae tumi koboraa tathapi'o sapata bhanga nakaraiba’. Niscaya ami te'omka dhairyasila pa'ichilo. Kimana ye uttama banda achila te'om! Niscaya te'om achila amara abhimukhi.
38|45|Arau smarana karaa, amara banda ibraahima, ichahakba arau iyakubara katha, te'omloka ataye achila saktisali arau suksmadarsi.
38|46|Niscaya ami te'omlokaka eta bisesa gunara adhikarai karaichilo, seya achila akhiraatara smarana.
38|47|Arau niscaya te'omloka achila amara ocarata manonita uttama bandasakalara an'yatama.
38|48|Arau smarana karaa, ichama'ila, ala-iyaca'a arau jula-kiphalara katha, e'omloka ataye achila sajjanasakalara antarbhukta.
38|49|E'ito eta smarana. Niscaya muttakbisakalara babe ache uttama abasa
38|50|cirasthayi jannata, yara duraarasamuha te'omlokara babe unmukta.
38|51|Tata te'omloke a'uji bahiba, tata te'omloke bahu dharanara phalamula arau paniya anibalai ka’ba.
38|52|Arau te'omlokara ocarata thakiba anatanayana samabayasiya (gabhurau choraalisakala).
38|53|E'ito hicapa dirasara babe tomalokaka diya pratisrauti.
38|54|Niscaya e'ito ami pradana karaa raijikba yito ketiya'o nihsesa naha’ba.
38|55|E'itorae'i. Niscaya simalanghanakarai bilakara babe ache nikrstatama pratyarartanasthala
38|56|jahannama, tata sihamta agnidagdha ha’ba, (eya) kimana ye nikrsta bisraamasthala
38|57|E'itorae'i. Eteke sihamte utala pani arau gela-pumjara soraada la'omka.
38|58|Arau ache e'i jatiya bibhinna dharanara sasti.
38|59|Eya eta bahini, tomalokara lagate'i praraesa karaiche. Sihamtara babe kono abhinandana na'i. Niscaya sihamta ju'ita jbaliba.
38|60|Anusaraisakale ka’ba, ‘baram tomaloke'o (ju'ita jbaliba), tomalokara babe'o kono abhinandana na'i. Tomaloke'i amara babe e'i bipada anicha. Eteke kimana ye nikrsta e'i abasasthala!’
38|61|Sihamte ka’ba, ‘he amara raba! Yiye amara babe e'i bipada karhiya'i aniche, jahannamata taka tumi dbiguna sasti diya’.
38|62|Sihamte arau ka’ba ye, ‘ki ha’la, ami yisakala lokaka beya buli ganya karaichilo sihamtaka dekhuna (iyata) dekha poraa na'i’.
38|63|‘Ami sihamtaka ene'i upaluna karaichilo neki, ne sihamtara bisaye amara drsti bibhrama ghatiche’
38|64|niscaya e'ito bastara satya, jahannamisakalara eya parasparaika bada-pratibada.
38|65|Koraa, ‘ma'ihe kerala ejana satarkakarai mathona arau allahara bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i, te'om ekaka, prabala pratapasali.
38|66|‘Teraemi akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majata thaka sakalo bastura raba, prabala paraakramasali, parama ksamasila’.
38|67|Koraa, ‘e'ito eta mahasambada
38|68|‘yitora paraa tomaloke bimukha hai acha.
38|69|‘Urd'dhaloka samparke mora kono jnana nachila yetiya te'omloke badanubada karaichila.
38|70|‘Mora ocarata e'i ahi ahiche ye, ma'i kerala ejana satarkakarai mathona’.
38|71|Smarana karaa, yetiya tomara pratipalake phiraistasakalaka kaichila, ‘ma'i alatiya boka matirae manuha srsti karaima
38|72|‘eteke yetiya ami te'omka susama karaima arau tata mora rauha sancara karaima, tetiya tomaloke te'omra prati chajadaranata ha’ba’.
38|73|‘Tetiya phiraistasakala ataye chajadaranata ha’la
38|74|kerala ibalichara bahirae, si ahankara karaile arau kaphirabilakara antarbhukta ha’la.

38|75|Allahe ka’le, ‘he ibalicha! Ma'i yaka mora duhaterae srsti karaicho, te'omra prati chajadaranata ha’balai tomaka kihe badha pradana karaile? Tumi ahankara karaila neki? Ne tumi adhika ucca maryadasampanna’
38|76|si ka’le, ‘ma'i te'omtakai sraestha. Tumi moka agnirae srsti karaicha arau te'omka srsti karaicha alatiya boka matirae’.
38|77|Te'om ka’le, ‘tumi iyara paraa ola'i yoraa, kiyano niscaya tumi abhisapta.
38|78|‘Arau niscaya tomara oparata mora abhisapa thakiba, karmaphala dirasa laike’.
38|79|Si ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Eteke tumi moka arakasa diya se'i dina laike yidina sihamtaka punaraut'thita karaa ha’ba’.
38|80|Te'om ka’le, ‘yoraa, niscaya tumi arakasa praaptabilakara antarbhukta
38|81|‘nirdharaita samaya upasthita horaara dina laike’.
38|82|Si ka’le, ‘tomara ksamata-sanmanara sapata! Arasye ma'i sihamtara ata'ike pathabhrasta karaima
38|83|‘kintu sihamtara majara tomara ekanistha bandasakalara bahirae’.
38|84|Allahe ka’le, ‘tente e'itorae'i satya, arau ma'i satyahe ka'om
38|85|‘arasye tomara dbaraa arau sihamtara majara yibilake tomara anusarana karaiba sihamta sakalorae dbaraa ma'i jahannama purna karaima’.
38|86|Koraa, ‘ma'i iyara babe tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao arau ma'i kono prabancaka-chalanakarai'o nahaya’.
38|87|Eya kerala srstijagatara babe upadesa matra.
38|88|Arau iyara sambada tomaloke arasye janiba, kichudina pichata.
